<section class="my-5">

### Column chart

<div class="row">

<!-- First column for large screen --> 
<div class="col-lg-6">

```{r column_code, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
# Loading required packages
library(unhcrthemes)
library(tidyverse)

# Loading data
df_column <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GDS-ODSSS/unhcr-dataviz-platform/master/data/comparison/column.csv")

ggplot(df_column) +
  geom_col(aes(x = year, y = displacedNumber),
           fill = unhcr_pal(n = 1, "pal_blue"),
           width = 0.8) +
  labs(title = "Globalement IDP displacement | 2010 - 2020",
       y = "Number of people (in million)",
       caption = "Source: UNHCR Refugee Data Finder\n© UNHCR, The UN Refugee Agency") +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(c(0, 0.1))) +
  theme_unhcr(grid = "Y",
              axis = "x",
              axis_title = "y")
```

</div>
<!-- End First column --->

<!-- Second column for large screen --> 
<div class="col-lg-6">


```{r r_column_chart, echo=FALSE, out.width="100%", fig.height=5.75}
# Loading data
df_column <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GDS-ODSSS/unhcr-dataviz-platform/master/data/comparison/column.csv")

ggplot(df_column) +
  geom_col(aes(x = year, y = displacedNumber),
           fill = unhcr_pal(n = 1, "pal_blue"),
           width = 0.8) +
  labs(title = "Globalement IDP displacement | 2010 - 2020",
       y = "Number of people (in million)",
       caption = "Source: UNHCR Refugee Data Finder\n© UNHCR, The UN Refugee Agency") +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(c(0, 0.1))) +
  unhcrthemes::theme_unhcr(font_size = 12, grid = "Y", axis = "x", axis_title = "y")
```

</div>
